ports.description: This illustration called “Drifting” was created completely in Adobe Illustrator on a day of quarantine during the Covid-19 crisis.

ports.description: UX/UI and brand design for a manufacturing company focused on cables and assemblies.

ports.label: Illustration
ports.title: Illustration: Church History
ports.description: Using patterns and varying line strokes, this illustration attempts to capture the elegance and intricacies of shared Church History. This was sketched as a part of a larger print project focused on depicting church history in a new and engaging way.

ports.label: UX / UI Design
ports.title: UX / UI + Branding: CWI
ports.description: UX/UI and brand design for a manufacturing company focused on inddustrial wires. This project's deliverables included a full icon library, full website design, print design and even video production.

ports.label: Branding
ports.title: Branding: Coffee Logo
ports.description: The love of coffee leads designers like me to making things like this. This coffee brand uses a mix of organic lines and elegant typography to give off the sense of smooth luxury - something that I'd bet most coffee drinkers are looking for in their daily grinds.
